title: Mortgage and refinance interest rates today, January 23, 2026: Close to one-year lows
full_text: Mortgage and refinance interest rates today, January 23, 2026: Close to one-year lows. These are today's mortgage and refinance interest rates. The 30-year rate has bounced fractionally off a one-year low. Lock in your rate today.. Today's national average mortgage and refinance lates remain close to one-year lows. According to Freddie Mac, the 30-year fixed mortgage rate for the week averaged 6.09%. One year ago, it was 6.96%.… [+4767 chars]
